name: City Landmark (AI Template)
description: Template created from project: City Landmark (AI Template)
author: Admin AI

config.title: Perception of Urban Landmarks Through Street View Images
config.description: This survey investigates public perceptions of city landmarks using street view images, focusing on visual appeal, visibility, accessibility, recognition, and significance. Your insights will aid city planners and architects in understanding how these landmarks contribute to urban identity and community cohesion.

pages.name: introduction
pages.title: Introduction
pages.description: Welcome to our survey on urban landmarks! We aim to understand how people perceive the visual appeal, visibility, accessibility, recognition, and cultural significance of city landmarks in street view images. Your responses will contribute to urban development strategies.

pages.name: image_selection_methodology
pages.title: Image Selection Methodology
pages.description: We use stratified random sampling for image selection to ensure diversity and relevance. Images are sourced from Google Street View, selected for clarity, perspective, and urban context. Standardization techniques include adjusting size, resolution, and environmental factors. Selected landmarks are chosen based on their representation of urban identity and frequency in public discourse.

pages.title: Streetscape Elements Assessment
pages.description: Evaluate the presence and quality of streetscape elements such as lighting, signage, seating, and vegetation around the landmarks.

pages.description: Gather opinions on potential design changes or interventions to improve landmark recognition and accessibility.
